slots.name: category
slots.label: Alert Category
slots.description: Add a categorical column (e.g., Issue Type, Priority Level, Alert Status). Only the first category value will be displayed as a single KPI card.

slots.name: identifier
slots.label: Record ID
slots.description: Add a unique identifier column (ID, timestamp, etc.) to count unique alerts/records. The card will show the count of unique IDs for the selected category.

slots.name: measure
slots.label: Order/Severity (Optional)
slots.description: Add a numeric column (e.g., _ORDER or _SEVERITY) to control color assignment. 0=Red (Critical), 1=Yellow (Warning), 2=Green (Info), etc. If omitted, uses first color.

slots.name: legend
slots.label: Title (Optional)
slots.description: Add any column to use its name as the widget title. The column NAME will be displayed (not its values). If omitted, title is hidden.
